rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
儿童心理研究所牵头努力增强功能磁共振成像儿童心理研究所在《自然人类行为》杂志上发表了一篇论文，详细介绍了他们的开创性研究，题为“超越静息状态功能脑成像中的处理和分析相关变异”。该研究发现了用于了解大脑功能和行为的功能磁共振成像（fMRI）的可重复性和标准化方面的重大挑战；并提出具体的解决方案，推动该领域取得转化为现实世界影响的成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Child-Mind-Institute-leads-effort-to-enhance-fMRI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Child-Mind-Institute-leads-effort-to-enhance-fMRI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=792ee7b7-8e5d-4c5c-b58c-b41f07e609c7 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 00:06:54 -0400 Child Mind Institute leads effort to enhance fMRI
骨质疏松症和衰老在细胞水平上相关一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 14 期封面上，题为“Association Betweenosteoporosis and the the端粒缩短率。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Osteoporosis-and-aging-linked-at-cellular-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Osteoporosis-and-aging-linked-at-cellular-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ae24c4b-1b01-4b92-ba77-18558bb3d5c8 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 23:56:48 -0400 Osteoporosis and aging linked at cellular level
人工智能揭示了九个器官系统中衰老、慢性疾病和生活方式因素的遗传联系研究揭示了遗传因素如何影响不同器官系统的生物年龄，揭示它们与生活方式、慢性疾病和潜在治疗干预措施的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/AI-reveals-genic-links-in-aging-chronic-diseases-and-lifestyle-factors-across-nine-organ-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/AI-reveals-genic-links-in-aging-chronic-diseases-and-lifestyle-factors-across-nine-organ-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8113614-59df-43c5-bc9c-0a8cdbf2872a Mon, 05 Aug 2024 23:42:00 -0400 AI reveals genetic links in aging, chronic diseases, and lifestyle factors across nine organ systems
研究发现，上呼吸道微生物群显示出年龄、性别和生活方式的影响荷兰的一项研究分析了不同年龄段的上呼吸道微生物群，发现微生物组成、年龄、性别和吸烟和抗生素使用等生活方式因素之间存在显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Upper-respiratory-microbiome-shows-age-sex-and-lifestyle-impacts-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Upper-respiratory-microbiome-shows-age-sex-and-lifestyle-impacts-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81abe51b-037f-474e-a64f-526a468043ed Mon, 05 Aug 2024 23:21:00 -0400 Upper respiratory microbiome shows age, sex, and lifestyle impacts, study finds
研究发现，超过一半的肺炎患者面临诊断不确定性一项全国性研究发现，超过一半的肺炎患者从初次就诊到出院经历了不一致的诊断，凸显了诊断的显着不确定性以及提高肺炎护理准确性的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Over-half-of-pneumonia-病人-face-diagnostic-uncertainty-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Over-half-of-pneumonia-病人-face-diagnostic-uncertainty-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac827444-e174-4472-94a9-1ecd8942776e Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Over half of pneumonia patients face diagnostic uncertainty, study finds
美国每年癌症筛查费用超过 400 亿美元一项模型研究估计，美国每年的癌症筛查成本超过 400 亿美元，凸显了制定政策优先顺序以增强公平获取的必要性。该研究强调，推荐的筛查可显着降低癌症特异性死亡率，并且具有成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Cancer-screening-costs-exceed-2440-billion-annually-in-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Cancer-screening-costs-exceed-2440-billion-annually-in-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6442f266-fc2a-4404-95ba-b5a85c8c7aa6 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:45:00 -0400 Cancer screening costs exceed $40 billion annually in the United States
石榴皮提取物恢复皮肤平衡，抵抗感染石榴皮提取物通过减少金黄色葡萄球菌和促进表皮葡萄球菌生长，有效恢复皮肤微生物群平衡，显示出其作为无毒抗菌治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Pomegranate-peel-extract-restores-skin-balance-fights-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Pomegranate-peel-extract-restores-skin-balance-fights-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d217b742-59f9-46b5-8d5b-e4d30f370543 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:33:00 -0400 Pomegranate peel extract restores skin balance, fights infections
INT-1B3增强小鼠模型的抗肿瘤免疫力并延长生存期2024年7月12日，Oncotarget第15卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“INT-1B3，一种LNP配制的miR-193a-3p模拟物，通过调节肿瘤来增强T细胞介导的免疫反应，从而促进抗肿瘤免疫”微环境和诱导免疫原性细胞死亡。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/INT-1B3-enhances-anti-tumor-immunity-and-prolongs-survival-in-mouse-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/INT-1B3-enhances-anti-tumor-immunity-and-prolongs-survival-in-mouse-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860ad86b-bf39-46cb-a9e7-ac8d8e235319 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:32:39 -0400 INT-1B3 enhances anti-tumor immunity and prolongs survival in mouse models
著名外科肿瘤学家在纽约大学格罗斯曼长岛医学院担任领导职务纽约大学长岛朗格尼医院 Perlmutter 癌症中心任命著名创新外科肿瘤学家 Gary B. Deutsch（医学博士、公共卫生硕士）担任纽约大学格罗斯曼长岛医学院肿瘤外科主任。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Renowned-surgical-oncological-takes-leadership-role-at-NYU-Grossman-Long-Island-School-of-Medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Renowned-surgical-oncological-takes-leadership-role-at-NYU-Grossman-Long-Island-School-of-Medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7b7ee01-663d-4ee0-9893-80f20d125ae8 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:28:02 -0400 Renowned surgical oncologist takes leadership role at NYU Grossman Long Island School of Medicine
确保人工智能在医疗保健领域的可持续和负责任的使用一篇新论文强调了在医疗保健领域负责任且可持续地使用人工智能的必要性，以减轻其对环境的影响，尤其是其高碳足迹。它提供了减少能源消耗和改进可持续发展实践的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Ensuring-sustainable-and-responsible-use-of-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Ensuring-sustainable-and-responsible-use-of-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a40d2b-1c56-47a7-bd50-309647a19b08 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 21:29:00 -0400 Ensuring sustainable and responsible use of AI in healthcare
